analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x1dd7c1a2be393644bf56420aa64d53058a3c430a.sol:
	Contract SodaCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x1dd7c1a2be393644bf56420aa64d53058a3c430a.sol#194-195)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x1dd7c1a2be393644bf56420aa64d53058a3c430a.sol#67-69) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_supply' of SodaCoin.totalSupplyIncrease (/unique_chucks/23/0x1dd7c1a2be393644bf56420aa64d53058a3c430a.sol) is not in mixedCase
